sentences.en: A little old woman with a wrinkled face as brown as a berry told us our fortunes for ten pence.
sentences.cn: 一位满脸皱纹皮肤黝黑的小个儿老妇人向我们索取十便士,替我们算命.

sentences.en: A muskeg berry is a bit of seed enclosed in a bit of water.
sentences.cn: 这种沼地浆果只有一小粒种籽,外面包着一点浆水.

sentences.en: An elegant sparkling rose, with subtle berry flavours and soft candy finish.
sentences.cn: 一款优雅的玫瑰红起泡葡萄酒, 具有淡雅的莓果风味和柔和的糖果香甜.

sentences.en: Aroma of strawberry and other berry fruits with hints of oak.
sentences.cn: 口感清新,草莓和樱桃的风味中带有一点橡木和牛油的味道.

sentences.en: Berry Gordy had worked in many jobs before starting Motown Records.
sentences.cn: 戈迪在开始他的摩城公司之前做过许多工作.

sentences.en: Berry is reanalyzing another earlier Taxol study, and Moore urged other scientists to do the same.
sentences.cn: Berry重新分析了另一项早先的泰素研究.与此同时, Moore鼓励其他科学家也这么做.

sentences.en: Berry Sugar were down eight at one seventy one, on doubts about the commodity price.
sentences.cn: 由于市场对糖价看跌,BERRY糖业公司股价下跌了8便士,跌至1.71英镑.

sentences.en: Birds feed on nuts and berries in the winter.
sentences.cn: 鸟类靠坚果和浆果过冬。

sentences.en: Indeed, even fewer people realize what the word berry technically refers to.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 了解浆果其学理意义的人就更少了.

sentences.en: Moderate tannins intermixed with black berry jam and toasty new oak.
sentences.cn: 丹宁适中,醋栗果浆和烤新橡木桶口感.

sentences.en: Mrs Berry asked her students to make a card for their father.
sentences.cn: Berry小姐叫她的学生为他们的爸爸做一张卡片.

sentences.en: Of course, if we got married, her name would be Halle Berry - Perry.
sentences.cn: 当然, 如果我们结婚的话, 她的名字就会变成哈里拜瑞派瑞.

sentences.en: Soft tannins combined with cedar, berry fruits, chocolate and blackcurrant.
sentences.cn: 丹宁柔和,充满橡木, 梅子果实, 巧克力和黑醋栗味道.

sentences.en: The flavor is mild and fruity, and berry texture is firm.
sentences.cn: 味道温和,水果, 浆果和质地是坚定的.

sentences.en: This berry is a favorite with the natives of the interior of New England.
sentences.cn: 这种浆果是新英格兰内地人最喜欢吃的.

sentences.en: This kind of jam is made of berry.
sentences.cn: 这种果酱是由浆果做的.

sentences.en: Whether the legend is true or not, the discovery of coffee dates back to 800 A.D. when Africans created a coffee-berry pulp.
sentences.cn: 不论这个传说是真是假，咖啡的发现要回溯到公元800年，那时非洲人制造出了一种咖啡浆果浆。

words.tran_cn: 有卵的；结浆果的；浆果状的

trans.tran_en: a small soft fruit with small seeds
